assignment_description:
For teams with 4 or more members, each person is responsible for creating 2 individual webpages, while the entire team will work collaboratively on the home and about pages.For teams with fewer than 4 members, you must create a total of 10 pages: 8 individual pages plus the home and about pages. Please review the project guidelines thoroughly to ensure all requirements are met.A submission link will be available on Moodle for you to upload a compressed folder containing your project files. Only one team member needs to submit the project. The submission deadline is Saturday, November 2nd at 11: 59 PM. Late submissions will not be accepted.
 To compress your folder: 
 -Right-click on the folder containing your project files. 
-Select “Compress to.” 
- If you don't have options available, download the compressions tools using either of these links (https: //www.win-rar.com or https://www.7-zip.org) 
 -Choose the “Zip” option.
